name: Facebook profile pic. rounder
description: Rounds profile pics. on facebook in places such as (in chat bar, on posts, on comments, on timeline. This is purely cosmetic, but I personally think it looks kinda cool. Try thi CSS if you like rounded pictures as opposed to boring squares on facebook.
additional_info: Note: all other changes, including color, font, and left side bar, are due to the chrome webstore app Fabulous. this CSS only changes profile pics. to circles.
